listitem.para: This command will load the GIF picture (compressed bitmap image) specified by the filename input. The filename input must be a word that is the name of valid GIF file.

If the picture is small enough, it will be pasted onto the screen such that its lower left corner will be at the turtle's current position. Otherwise, the picture will be positioned in the upper left corner of the screen. The picture is always pasted right-side-up with the bottom running horizontally and the sides running vertically, regardless of the turtle's orientation.
GIFLOAD is equivalent to selecting the Bitmap - Load menu option.
